overview: Medical malpractice will be the furthest thing from your mind when these naughty nurses are on the clock! Their bedside manner isn’t the problem…especially when this kinky staff is hospitable enough to take care of all your throbbing aches the only way they know how. Nurse Laurie doesn’t mind taking Shelby’s temperature with her fingers and tongue to make her feel better. Jon Dough is the doctor to call when you need his tool for deep tissue injections! Watch them suck and fuck their way to the perfect state of being in “Confessions of a Slutty Nurse”.
title: Confessions of a Slutty Nurse
